page.title: 06SCHOOL GAMES1-WEST SLEEKBURN
page.content:
By{Lynne Henderson}and{Lisa Stewart}
These games are all played in the girls yard at West Sleekburn Middle School. Tug means to touch.
{Nash}-This game is similar to Hide and Seek except that when the person who is counting finds a person they have to 'tug' them.
{Granny's Shop}-The person who starts the game must think of something a shop sells and say{"My granny owns {a sweet shop and in it she sells BB." One of the others must run up and try to guess what it is.If they succeed they are on.
